snippet.title: Interview with William ("Bing") Gordon, Executive Vice President and Chief Creative Officer of Electronic Arts, a leading independent publisher and developer of interactive entertainment software. Gordon has been credited in many popular video games, among them The Sims, Command and Conquer: Generals, Sid Meier's Alpha Centauri, Sim Golf, Tiger Woods PGA Golf, and John Madden NFL Football. He lives and works in Los Angeles
